remarks: A closed interval in ` RR ` is compact.  Alternate proof of ~ icccmp using the Heine-Borel theorem ~ heibor .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
icccmpALT.1 $e |- J = ( A [,] B ) $.
icccmpALT.2 $e |- M = ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( J X. J ) ) $.
icccmpALT.3 $e |- T = ( MetOpen ` M ) $.
icccmpALT $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> T e. Comp ) $.
